# ========================================
# SUBSPACE CHATBOT - ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES
# ========================================
# Copy this content to a .env file in your project root

# NHOST CONFIGURATION
# Get these from your Nhost project dashboard
VITE_NHOST_SUBDOMAIN=your-nhost-subdomain
VITE_NHOST_REGION=us-east-1

# HASURA GRAPHQL ENDPOINTS
# These are automatically generated from your Nhost subdomain
VITE_HASURA_ENDPOINT=https://your-nhost-subdomain.nhost.run/v1/graphql
VITE_HASURA_WS_ENDPOINT=wss://your-nhost-subdomain.nhost.run/v1/graphql

# N8N WEBHOOK URL
# This will be your n8n webhook URL after setting up the workflow
VITE_N8N_WEBHOOK_URL=https://your-n8n-instance.n8n.cloud/webhook/chatbot

# ========================================
# N8N WORKFLOW ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES
# ========================================
# Add these in your n8n workflow environment variables

# HASURA CONFIGURATION FOR N8N
HASURA_ENDPOINT=https://your-nhost-subdomain.nhost.run/v1/graphql
HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET=your-hasura-admin-secret

# OPENROUTER API CONFIGURATION
OPENROUTER_API_KEY=your-openrouter-api-key
OPENROUTER_BASE_URL=https://openrouter.ai/api/v1

# APP URL (optional)
APP_URL=https://your-app.netlify.app
